title: [Bug]: presenter links not captured by app
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

presenter link not recognised

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
This is the 'presenter' link I was sent (doctored to remove confidential stuff)

https://teams.microsoft.com:443/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_aaaaaa%40thread.v2/0?context=%7B%22Tid%22%3A%22xxxxxxx%22%2C%22Oid%22%3A%22yyyyyyyyy%22%7D&pp=zzzzzzz

I think it was not properly recognised by Teams for Linux.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
